text:
@TheRickWilson @thedailybeast They believe that 
1. Only city dwellers get it
2. Only minorities and immigrants get it
3. Only old people 60+ get it
4. Only poor get it

Let's see where the case load for Covid-19 is in 14 days (May 3rd).
